taskDescription: Reaction of cis-2-butene with m-chloroperoxybenzoic acid yields an epoxide different from that obtained by reaction of the trans isomer. Explain.
detailedSolution: Epoxidation of cis-2-butene yields cis-2,3-epoxybutane, while epoxidation of trans-2-butene yields trans-2,3-epoxybutane.
